p: GC-MS analysis of chloroform soluble fraction indicates the presence of various nitrogen containing compounds which might contribute toward the analgesic and anti-inflammatory activity. Moreover, Salicylate compound 2-Ethylhexyl salicylate was also detected in the extract which is also known for such activities. Therefore, our results indicate that crude alkaloids isolated from different parts of ZA might have exerted their effect to alleviate the pain, inflammation, and fever in mice.
